item.title: hugo plus
item.author: Daniel Hatch
item.description:
A modular featured-packed Hugo theme that’s built using Bootstrap components. The idea is to provide a foundation of componets that can targetted and customized to provide a consistent set of features across Hugo themes.

Each theme provides a different layout while allowing the Bootstap theme to be interchangeable.

This allows a Bootstrap theme to work across layout changes and Layouts to work across Bootstrap theme changes.

View Project Â»
